data.text: @myusername2017 They have been trying for a biosphere program and world heritage site since the early 90s kind of like mammoth cave in Kentucky
@myusername2017 I could tell stories about caves and speakeasies all night
@brianPr86073081 My mother in law's side of the family is all buried at Big Flat cemetery.
@myusername2017 We would ride to big flat and get budwiser all the bootleggers had was Busch and old Milwakee on Wednesday night when the traffic was light

@brianPr86073081 My mother in law was born and raised in Fifty-Six. We have heard some pretty wild stores of my husband's  great- granddad, who drank a lot, and how there were bars or whatever in a few caves up there. I love to imagine what the 20's & 30's would have been like up there.
@brianPr86073081 I just read "Buffalo River is one of the most cave rich units of the National Park system". Didn't know that 👍
@LynnChastain2 This is what I've been thinking....
@myusername2017 The caves on Buffalo have been locked for 30 years
@myusername2017 More land grab take away that's all
